Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Yes CCduration no hashBlock means means it catn find the  transaction .. it was orphaned

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: or it means the dealer isnt sending the dice finish tx

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: If the pool is on a diffrent version, that has consensus changes, the tx that you send, that dnt meet what the mining node is looking for will be automaticaly purged from the mempool.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I can tell you that the FSM branch on STAKED testnet atm, is definatly having problems,... the only chain in the cluster to do so. All other branches are equal to the getTransactionFix commit .

Content: So whatever it is, was pushed in after that.
